nodes.text: The Kemalo Farming Cluster was a farming settlement on Kinyen, inhabited by Gran farmers. When the settlement ran behind on its quota, one farmer, Rake Dee, suggested hiring the slicer Skaak Tippers to run the farm remotely through droids. When the farmers ran out of credits to pay the slicer, who had been blackmailing them, he remotely programmed the droids to attack the community.
